amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow the EPA to use all peer-reviewed scientific publications.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 113-626 to allow the EPA to use all peer-reviewed scientific publications.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kennedy amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 230 (Roll no. 526).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Kennedy amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 230 (Roll no. 526).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Kennedy.
